code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReserveForm(){const{id}=useParams();const[name,setName]=useState('');const[date,setDate]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert(`Reserva feita para ${name} na chácara ${id} no dia ${date}.`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reserve-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"btn",children:"Voltar"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Reserva para a Ch\xE1cara ",id," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Nome:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Data:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",children:"Reservar"})]})]});}export default ReserveForm;
